rules.description: S3 bucket or Blob Storage configured without encryption at rest — violates FTA data protection requirements for tax-relevant records
rules.source: FTA Public Clarification VATP017 (2023), Section 4.1 – Electronic Records Retention
rules.remediation: Enable server-side encryption (AES-256 or KMS) on all storage containing invoices, contracts, or customer data. Verify encryption status in bucket properties.
